charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1101_0100:
While out on a stroll, [Name:PlayerNickname ] 
heard someone apologizing profusely.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_0300:
I didn’t m-mean for anything like this to...
It wasn’t supposed to happen like this!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_0400:
I’ve just arrived on Pasio, so it must be some kind
of mistake that I’ve won!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_0600: It’s all good. Do your best, OK?
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_1200:
Um... I’m still not used to how battles on
Pasio work.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_1300:
I’ve always done Double Battles, so I know how to
work together with Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_1400:
But in that match I just had, I only won because
Entei is so strong...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_1500:
At this rate, I’d be too embarrassed to look my
sisters or Battle Maison customers in the eye!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0301_1900: It’s like Entei is your teacher!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0401_2000: My teacher? I guess that makes sense.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0402_2200:
I guess you’re right. I suppose a family member
would scold someone for being so negative...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_2300:
Entei is the most responsible of all the Pokémon
I use back at the Battle Maison...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_2400:
There’s Suicune and Raikou, and they’re strong,
too... But I feel most comfortable with Entei.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_2500:
Double Battles are all about combinations, so
Entei always helps me out a lot...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_2600:
So when I had to choose just one Pokémon to be
my partner here, I chose Entei.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0301_2700:
Maybe Entei wants to battle a lot
more here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0401_2800:
Y-yes, I think so. We did come all this way
and become a sync pair, after all.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0402_3000:
I-I hope so! And if so, I have to work even
harder than before.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_3100:
I know that I’d be no good if I just stayed the way
I am now...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_3200:
And I don’t want my older sisters to scold me,
either... They’re even scarier than Entei.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0401_3400:
W-well...my oldest sister is usually rather kind,
but she’s scary when she’s angry.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0401_3500:
My second oldest sister is always scolding me...
but she also cheers me on, too!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_0402_3700:
They’re nothing like me... They’re so cool and
always on top of their game.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_3800:
I also have a younger sister. They’re all very
good at battling.
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_3900:
Maybe there will be a day when you have a
match with us, the Battle Chatelaines...
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_4000:
Um...if you do, I’ll do my best to be more
confident when I battle!
charaepi_ch0205_00_lesoir/2301_1201_4100: Thank you for talking with me today!
